11:20.title: Transform your website to PWA
11:20.description: Progressive Web App is more and more important on the development of website nowadays. Adding PWA to exists project is not that easy, you will be introduced on the way of adding PWA to your exists project.

12:00.title: Building dynamic UI with Jetpack Compose
12:00.description: - Why Jetpack Compose? - Jetpack Compose 1001 - How Jetpack Compose solves our real life problem more elegantly

14:00.title: Getting away with not writing documentation by using gRPC
14:00.description: Sorry for the click-bait title. But seriously, come and learn how a modern RPC framework can improve the workflow and communication of your team(s).

14:40.title: Your Browser’s UI thread is overworked, underpaid, and begging your help
14:40.description:
- Why 99% of the Browsers’ UI threads are overworked
- Why the UI thread is going to be underpaid?
- Do You know your the UI Thread always send SOS signal to you?
- Off load your tasks by natures. UI threads only do UI works.

15:20.title: Codelab: Build a DevFest Agenda Action for Google Assistant using Actions Builder
15:20.description: Hands-on workshop to build a DevFest Agenda voice assistant app on Google Assistant platform. This time we will use the newly announced web-based IDE "Actions Builder" in the Actions console to build the action together. Beginner level, will do few lines coding but having programming background is not necessary. Requires laptop/computer with chrome browser.
